title: Beads Template Show Schema
description: Schema for the JSON output of the 'bd template show --json' command.

description.description: A detailed description of the template's purpose or content.

type.description: The issue type associated with this template (e.g., bug, feature, task, epic, chore).

priority.description: The default priority for issues created using this template (0-4).

labels.description: A list of default labels to apply to issues created from this template.

design.description: Default design notes or considerations for issues created with this template.

acceptance_criteria.description: Default acceptance criteria for issues created with this template.
